Description: An Affordable Tone Machine!The affordable Gibson LPJ solidbody electric guitar is the perfect addition to any collection. You get a solid mahogany, traditional weight-relieved body that exudes tone. A carved maple cap gives this Les Paul the classic edge and bite that it's known for. You'll find the traditional '50s neck profile capped with a rosewood fingerboard easy and comfortable to play. And two humbucking pickups with Alnico II magnets give you the warm, fat tones you expect from a Les Paul. The Gibson LPJ electric guitar is an affordable tone machine, get your hands on one today!Gibson LPJ Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance:Classic Les Paul tones from choice tonewoodsHigh-output humbuckers deliver solid Les Paul soundBlack hardware gives this guitar a unique lookClassic guitar tones from choice tonewoodsThe Gibson LPJ serves up fat guitar tones thanks to its mahogany body. The carved maple cap provides the perfect amount of aggression and bite to this extremely playable guitar. You'll find the maple neck's '50s rounded profile to be the perfect combination of chunk and comfort. Classic trapezoid inlays in the rosewood fretboard give the Gibson LPJ an unmistakable look. This guitar serves up serious tone and killer playability.High-output humbuckers deliver solid Les Paul soundTo capture the classic Les Paul sound, Gibson decided to give the LPJ a pair of classic-style humbuckers, including a 490R at the neck and a 498T at the bridge. These pickups capture the sound of traditional 1950s PAFs tweaked to bring out more midrange snarl. Together with the LPJ's mahogany body, this pair of humbuckers gives you a tone that was born to rock.Black hardware gives this guitar a unique lookThe Gibson LPJ offers a look that is different from other Les Pauls. Black pickup covers, tuner button, and control knobs give this guitar a sleek look that means business. If you're not into the chrome or gold look, the Gibson LPJ is the perfect alternative. The lack of a pickguard also make this guitar stand out from the crowd. If you like to buck the norm, but still want killer tones and playability, the Gibson LPJ is for you.Gibson LPJ Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:An affordable Les Paul with great tone and feelHigh-output Gibson humbuckers deliver solid Les Paul soundTraditional weight-relieved mahogany body and carved maple topComfortable '50s rounded profile maple neck with rosewood fretboardThe Gibson LPJ is an affordable guitar that's ready to rock!
Title: 2013 Gibson Les Paul Junior Rubbed White Satin
ConditionDescription: Great Condition, a few wear marks as indicated in the photos but in excellent shape, plays wonderfully with a nice straight neck and low action.
